name: Disclosure; renewability
text: Individual long-term care insurance policies shall contain a renewability provision.  The provision shall be appropriately captioned, shall appear on the first page of the policy, and shall clearly state the duration, where limited, of renewability and the duration of the term of coverage for which the policy is issued and for which it may be renewed.  This provision shall not apply to policies that do not contain a nonrenewability provision, and under which the right to nonrenew is reserved solely to the policyholder. [L 1999, c 93, pt of §2]
